comments:

I'm not seeing this with a fresh install of I-I20050609-200506090936.  Did you
unzip this build over an old one?

Andreas wrote:
>Yes. Is this generally a problem? The depedancies of WTP did not change.

Yes, dependencies among the WTP plugins themselves may change as some plugins
are removed and others are added.  It's best to at least remove the old WTP
plugins first.  Also, the JEM dependency did change recently.
verifying classified correctly and not a problem.
